oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The What and the How: Meaningful Learning Facilitators
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This project is mainly based on reflection from the part of teachers to change, adapt or improve those elements in the process of teaching and learning that somehow allow students to benefit from an efficient and meaningful second language learning experience. The project considers both what is supposed to be taught in a second language classroom and also how it should be taught, always relating these reflections to literature on the issue and my own placement period experience.
